ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Anyone else a bad fashion statement like me?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... While i m auctioning, some twink bard in full lambent at lev 12 pops up to me asks me what i wanted for my hero bracer (im auctioning it because i have a
ygData.messageBody:
>
While i'm auctioning, some twink bard in full lambent at lev 12 pops up to
me asks me what i wanted for my hero bracer (im auctioning it because i have
a spare) then after a wee bit says oh nm, i thought you were a twink and
not a real player. Talk about kicking me while im down.
>

/comfort Minkin

Sickening, isn't it? I dinged into 35 earlier this week and made a b-line
for Kelethin to train in Tracking (sunk 38 points into it... brilliant
skill). While I was in the neighbourhood, I paid a visit to Mr. D'Vinn to
give him my regards and relieve him of his Dirk.

I was in the tower, looking out one of the windows when I see a Bard in full
Lambent on the receiving end of a sound spanking from a Centurion. A quick
/who bard showed him as level 7. Nothing new there; it happens all the
time. I'm not bitter, cos, you know, I *worked* for my Lambent and didn't
buy a single piece... grumble.

I hop down from the tower to give him a hand and someone shouts out "OMG!
Two bard twinks in the zone. Don't expect us to save your asses."

?!!

I later had to save this fellow's hide when he pulled an almighty train to
the zone, but I'll continue that in Kitasi's thread...

Kyrisha
